teamDesc:
The WB SDSN team consisting leaders and experts from academia, business and educational sector.

Co-Chairs are coming from highly respective university positions in the Bosnia and Herzegovina. Network managers are experts in the field of research and development
lcDesc: Leadership Council consisting of visionary development leaders from academia, business, NGOs from Western Balkan countries (Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kosovo, Montenegro, Northern Macedonia, and Serbia) with our partners from SDSN Greece and SDSN Europe.
nmDesc: Network Managers have over 25 years of experience in the economics and research and development. Specialized in field of Management
youthDesc: The Youth Team mobilizes young people locally to create sustainable solutions.

title: The Team
